title: Multiple @Named functions in the same package seems broken
body:
### Describe the bug

Multiple handlers in the same package keeps throwing build exception, even whean @ Named.
Same issue described here
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/64283853/handling-aws-http-and-sqs-events-with-the-same-quarkus-codebase
